q: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said,`` The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't.'' Bill Lockyer 's point-- a valid one-- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments

It's no coincidence that this incident comes on the heels of Mike Pence 's( R-IN) introduction of H.R. 217, the Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act. The bill was introduced with the specific purpose of targeting Planned Parenthood. So what's at stake?
